髺字的基本解释

髺
kuò
束（发）；挽（发髻）：“主人髺发。”

髺
yuè
器物折足，形体歪斜。

髺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuò］
［《廣韻》古活切，入末，見。］
束发。参见“髺髮”。
[②]［yuè］
［《字彙補》魚厥切］
见“髺2墾”。

髺字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【髟字部】　髺； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1454第15
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?古活切，音括。【說文】本作䯺，潔髮也。【儀禮·士喪禮】主人髺髮，袒。【疏】髺髮者，去筓纚而紒。【韻會】或作鬠。通作括。　又【集韻】戸括切，音活。義同。　又【周禮·冬官考工記·旊人】凡陶旊之事，髺墾薜暴不入市。【註】鄭司農云：髺讀爲刮。康成謂：髺讀爲跀。【疏】跀謂器不正?邪者也。

髺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
髺字的起名意思

暂无。

Niu
Basic explanation of words
Niu
kuò
Bundle (hair); pull (hair bun): "The master has hair."
Niu
yuè
The utensils have their feet folded and their bodies slanted.
Niu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kuò]
["Guangyun" is ancient and lively, enter the end, see. ]
Bundle hair. See "Fa".
[②]［yuè］
[Fish Jue Cut in "Zihuibu"]
See "髺2 Ken".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Munzi Department】　髺; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1454 15
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Ancient and lively, including sound. [Said the text] This is a clean hair. 【Rituals·Funeral】The master has hair and blouses. 【Sparse】For those with hairy hair, go to 筓纚纚紒. 【Rhyme Meeting】Or make a scorpion. Pass for inclusion.　 [Ji Yun] including cutting, sound lively. The same meaning.　[Zhou Li·Dongguan Kao Gong Ji·Nian Ren] Anything about Tao Nian, Nie Ken Xie violently did not enter the market. [Note] Zheng Sinongyun: Niao is pronounced as scraping. Kang Cheng said: 髺 is pronounced as lame. [Sparse] It is said that the device is not righteous? The evil one is also.
